summary: Nx GitHub Issues: Automated Triage and Assignment
Nx GitHub Issues: Automated Triage and Team Assignment
Nx GitHub Issue Assignment: Bulk Triage and Reassignment

message.content: Can you please help me analyze the distribution of assigned github issues? How many issues of each priority is each member of the team assigned?

content.text: I'll help you analyze the distribution of assigned GitHub issues by team member and priority. Let me gather the current issue data from the nrwl/nx repository.

input.command: gh issue list --repo nrwl/nx --state open --limit 200 --json number,title,assignees,labels --jq '.[] | select(.assignees | length > 0) | {number: .number, title: .title, assignees: [.assignees[].login], labels: [.labels[].name]}'
input.description: Get all open assigned issues with assignees and labels

content.text: Let me fix the command syntax:

input.command: gh issue list --repo nrwl/nx --state open --limit 200 --json number,title,assignees,labels --jq '.[] | select(.assignees | length > 0) | {number: .number, title: .title, assignees: [.assignees[].login], labels: [.labels[].name]}'
input.description: Get all open assigned issues with assignees and labels

content.text: Let me try a simpler approach:

input.command: gh issue list --repo nrwl/nx --state open --limit 200 --json number,title,assignees,labels
input.description: Get all open issues with assignees and labels as raw JSON
